question: Write a letter to manager of the hotel, In your lettersay where you think you left the papersexplain why they are so importanttell the manager what you want him/her to do
text: I lately visited your esteemed hotel for a conference however I have had forgotten my documents which are still at the hotel.

We were allotted an Elite room which overlooks the garden area, as I was a part of the organising committee for the seminar, most of the time I was standing near the podium area. If I recollect well, I have placed the forms in a drawer where projector wires were tangled, just beside the podium bay.

Post our workshop, the onus was on me to seek feedback from the participants. Moreover, I had prepared a survey checklist assisting us to work on the improvement areas and acknowledge the strength factors. The shared comments would be vital for our future events helping our company to evolve.

I would genuinely request you to courier me those handouts and I shall bear the charges. It would be great if sent across “we-fast” courier service rather than the normal one as they guarantee to deliver posts within a couple of hours.
Looking forward to your helping hand.
